title: Pinnacle Foods, Inc. Recalls Chili Products Due To Misbranding
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan. 22, 2016 Pinnacle Foods, Inc., a Fort Madison, Iowa establishment, is recalling approximately 549,539 pounds of chili products due to misbranding, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products contain Monosodium Glutamate (MSG), which is not...
